Mel B Buang Cincin Kawin Senilai Rp667 Juta
06 Nov 2019, 16:39 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Mel B mengungkapkan bahwa ia memilih membuang cincin kawin ketimbang menjual dan memperoleh tambahan uang. (Alberto PIZZOLI / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Melanie BrownÂ atau dikenal Mel B mengungkapkan bahwa dia membuang cincin kawin senilai US$47.675 atau setara dengan Rp667 juta meski tengah dilanda masalah keuangan. Pada Agustus lalu, personel Spice Girls ini dilaporkan hanya memiliki uang senilai US$1.030 (Rp14,4 juta), sekalipun baru rampung menjalani tur reuni dengan grupnya di Inggris."(Mel) telah mencari pekerjaan baik di Amerika Serikat dan di Inggris, tetapi sayangnya dia belum berhasil. Saat ini, Melanie menganggur," berdasarkan surat-surat hukum yang diperoleh Daily Mail.Pelantun Wannabe itu kemudian mengklaim bahwa ia memang hanya memiliki kekayaan sebesar US$1.030 di bawah namanya, setelah bercerai dari sang mantan suami, Stephen Belafonte. Dalam sebuah obrolan di podcast Truth Flirts Badoo, dia juga mengungkapkan bahwa ia memilih membuang cincin kawin ketimbang menjual dan memperoleh tambahan uang dari sana."Saya tidak kehilangan cincin kawinku, tapi aku memang membuangnya," ungkap Mel, dikutip Aceshowbiz.Mel dan Belafonte menikah pada Juni 2007, dan berpisah pada Maret 2017. Penyanyi itu mengklaim mantan kekasihnya melecehkan dia selama pernikahan mereka. Sementara, sang mantan suami membantah klaim tersebut.Baru-baru ini, Mel pun telah mendapatkan pekerjaan baru dengan menjadi presenter di acara panel komedi Inggris "Celebrity Juice". Dia juga dilaporkan akan menjadi tuan rumah acara kencan daringnya di jejaring sosial Badoo yang ditujukan untuk para pencari cinta. (agn/end)

Mel B Dispose of Wedding Rings Worth Rp.667 Million
Nov 6 2019, 16:39 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Mel B revealed that he chose to throw away the wedding ring instead of selling and earning extra money. (Alberto PIZZOLI / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Melanie Brown, also known as Mel B, revealed that he threw away a wedding ring worth US $ 47,675 or equivalent to Rp.667 million despite being hit by financial problems. Last August, the Spice Girls reportedly only had US $ 1,030, even though they had just finished a reunion tour with their group in the UK. "(Mel) has been looking for work both in the United States and in Britain, but unfortunately he has not succeeded. Currently, Melanie is unemployed, "based on legal letters obtained by the Daily Mail. The singer of Wannabe then claims that he indeed only has a fortune of US $ 1,030 under his name, after divorcing from his ex-husband, Stephen Belafonte. In a chat on the Truth Flirts Badoo podcast, he also revealed that he chose to throw a wedding ring rather than sell and get extra money from there. "I did not lose my wedding ring, but I did throw it away," Mel said, quoted by Aceshowbiz. in June 2007, and separated in March 2017. The singer claimed her ex-boyfriend harassed her during their marriage. Meanwhile, the ex-husband has denied the claim. Recently, Mel has also gotten a new job by becoming a presenter on the British comedy panel show "Celebrity Juice". He also reportedly will host his online dating event on the social network Badoo aimed at love seekers. (agn / end)
